rules: Use Light Mode by default to convey cleanliness and safety.
Avoid pure black (#000000). Use Stone-900 (#1C1917) for text.
Gradients should be subtle and pastel (e.g., bg-gradient-to-br from-emerald-50 to-stone-50).
NO dark mode for the marketing pages. Dashboard can have a toggle.

spacing.scale: Generous. Use p-6, p-8, p-12 for containers.
spacing.rule: Containers with borders MUST have internal padding (p-6+) to prevent text collision.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to the index.html head immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (Safe Mint, Trust Blue, Warm Sand).
3. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: Heavily customize Shadcn components. Remove the default 'slate' look. Use 'stone' and 'emerald' instead.
4. MAPS: When implementing the map, use a custom style that matches the pastel palette (no default Google Maps colors). Mock this if no API key.
5. TRUST SIGNALS: Every time a walker is shown, add a 'Verified' badge. This is the core value proposition.
6. MOBILE FIRST: Ensure the 'Book a Walk' button is always accessible on mobile (sticky bottom).
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' designs. Be bold with spacing.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped.

Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
